ai-patthana22.7:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: allowance (the palace) to the Lord of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.7:0.3_0: robes and so on, looking for the shadow,
ai-patthana22.7:1.1_0: One is not skilled in thought. The teaching is not skilled in loss.
ai-patthana22.7:3.1_0: One should not give a teaching for those without excessive greed. The teaching doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities. Some causes reasons.
ai-patthana22.7:5.1_0: One who is not skilled in the teaching, not unprofitable; and with uncertainty gives rise to a cause of reason.
ai-patthana22.7:7.1_0: One who is not skilled in thought should not give rise to a teaching,
ai-patthana22.7:9.1_0: Not unskillful qualities arise in someone who isn’t skilled in loss, etc., conditioned by these causes.
ai-patthana22.7:11.1_0: Knowing these things, so an unprofitable teaching don’t give rise to cause or reason.
